lead_paragraph: Aaron Biebert’s documentary argues that e-cigarettes could help smokers quit, if only powerful forces weren’t trying to discredit them.

headline.main: Review: ‘A Billion Lives’ Claims There’s a Conspiracy Against Vaping

snippet: Aaron Biebert’s documentary argues that e-cigarettes could help smokers quit, if only powerful forces weren’t trying to discredit them....
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Aaron Biebert documentary film A Billion Lives.
